document.full_text: a leadership dispute that turned violent at a sikh temple in new york, interrupting prayers with swinging swords and cricket bats, landed congregants in court on monday on criminal charges, a prosecutor said.
document.title: prayers at sikh temple in new york erupt in sword fight
lines_and_colors: a leadership dispute that turned violent at a sikh temple in new york, interrupting prayers with swinging swords and cricket bats, landed congregants in court on monday on criminal charges, a prosecutor said.
